storyInfo: After extracting a large number of imprisoned hostages, Miłosz actively pitches in with Team Rainbow's bomb disposal efforts. Despite hopes they can rescue Reynell from under El Capitán's watch, Diaz gets kidnapped himself by El Capitán during the disposal process.

attributes.content: Fuze, sitrep?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Clear.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Defenders are pretty lazy. Zero guard against us storming them, and we didn't give them any time to notify their superiors.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Good work.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Time to begin the siege.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Everyone, we have to act quickly. Don't get sloppy, and don't give the defenders any time to react.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Did you hear something out there just now? An explosion?
attributes.name: Cowardly Soldier

attributes.content: Think so.
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: No way those lunatics actually came crashing in...
attributes.name: Cowardly Soldier

attributes.content: For what? To rescue Reynell?
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: No more hallucinating. Catch. This one's some sorta Yanese porcelain. Might smash with a single bump. Careful.
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: You almost smashed it along with the entire display case just now. You turn around and tell me...
attributes.name: Cowardly Soldier

attributes.content: By the way, didn't our leader break that vase thing, and say he was going upstairs to report to El Capitán? How come he's still not back?
attributes.name: Cowardly Soldier

attributes.content: Probably still climbing the stairs, just like the first time we came.
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: Or he's talking with El Capitán about giving these things a home. Maybe they've even figured out how much each of them are pocketing—
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: Grenade out!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: No hostages in the room! Take out the defenders!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The hell? You guys?
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: Don't wimp out! Their rapid-fire doesn't pack enough punch!
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: I... I'm not scared, I just want to find somewhere safe to call for reinforcements—
attributes.name: Cowardly Soldier

attributes.content: Don't even think about it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Grr. Decent shot.
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: Shame your charges just now were too weak. Took less from that than a slug bite—
attributes.name: Tired Soldier

attributes.content: And how about now?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Wait, you're the attackers? You must be crazy to seriously—
attributes.name: Cowardly Soldier

attributes.content: Of course we're serious.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Ela, what's that thing you say... Clear?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Nice work, but give us a heads up next time.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Doc, Iana, keep moving per Tequila's directions to the bulk of the hostages. Hostage safety is priority one.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No rash action in a bad situation. I'll lead the others to sweep the first floor of defenders, then we'll rendezvous with you.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Copy.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Diaz, Tecno, let's go.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Diaz?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Look at all this art. Palladulis Throwing a Javelin—a Minoan statue. This one's a pure gold, gilded enamel revolving vase from Yan...
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: And a manuscript from the great Ursine author Sergei Katayev... let me see which one of his it is...
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: ...'A Receiver Electrifying, or, In the Mire of the Heart.'
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Damn it all. This is the one. Reynell has it in his collection.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: He and Mateo are two kinds of scoundrels. One's blowing it up, one's selling it all... nothing but...
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Whatever. We'll leave it to the next guys to sort out. Let's move.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.text: In a deathly silent room, there is but a rapidly, incessantly pounding heart, and naught else. Save for—

attributes.content: S—Stay back! I'm not letting you in! You come in and we'll take you with us—
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: (Scratching noises about the door can be heard.)
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: The—The noise is gone. She's gone...
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Tut-tut-tut. What a scary scene.
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: What was this flick called...? Oh, Panic at the Museum: The Sankta Slaughter. This is the one by that Sarkaz director who lives in Columbia.
attributes.name: Worn-Out Soldier

attributes.content: Figures they made the villain a Sankta in this one then.
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Looks like Reynell's security isn't too busy most of the time. Guess all he can do is sit here watching tapes and fantasizing about murders taking place in his gallery.
attributes.name: Worn-Out Soldier

attributes.content: Good for them, though?
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: The way El Capitán sees it, everyone worth anything is downstairs moving stuff already. Meanwhile you've got us, who don't really care two ways about him, and we get to sit here on cushy guard duty—
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: There's trouble downstairs! I want a report from anyone who knows what, ASAP!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Trouble?
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: There's gunfire and explosions down there! People on the sixth floor heard it! What's going on with you?! Are you blind or deaf?!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: (Whisper) I told you to turn the volume down a little, but no you wouldn't.
attributes.name: Worn-Out Soldier

attributes.content: (Whisper) Shut up, you!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: I'll contact downstairs straight away!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: —Ugh, nope. Not getting through.
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Would I be asking you if I could?!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I want you to figure out what happened downstairs immediately! If there are troublemakers, flatten them! If they're fighting their way in, I want them out! Getting the art into the trucks is our highest priority!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Don't go, Scardullo, don't! Nobody who goes downstairs ever comes back!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: That Sankta woman's gone crazy! I saw her kill everyone in a public bathroom, and now she's after our lives!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: As waves of screams and shrieks emanate from the TV, the seven or eight soldiers in the one cramped surveillance room all look at each other in dismay.
Good news. Defenders in the surveillance room haven't noticed our drones.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Most hostages inside are in shock, and it appears the defenders have robbed them too, but at least there are no casualties, and emotions seem manageable.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Defenders have noticed something's not right downstairs. I assume they reported to their superiors just now, but clearly none are willing to leave what must seem like their safe little panopticon.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Good news indeed. You keep monitoring them, I'll contact Ela. We'll discuss countermeasures.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Hey? Gabi, what's going on? What the hell was all the ruckus downstairs?
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: I... I... don't know...
attributes.name: Ostracized Soldier

attributes.content: Don't know my ass! You've spent long enough, quit dawdling!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: I'm—I'm just... minding my surroundings, I just got to the stairwell entrance!
attributes.name: Ostracized Soldier

attributes.content: Your voice is trembling, huevón! What, did the spooky movie get to you? Hahaha!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Shut up! Be... Besides, I don't see you down here! It's always like this, you guys shove everything onto me—
attributes.name: Ostracized Soldier

attributes.content: Huh? Gabi?
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Gabi??
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: No! We can't let anyone else go downstairs!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Weren't you watching in the surveillance room?! That Sankta madwoman didn't even have to touch her!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: She just unloaded into the receiver when Scardullo picked up, and turned her into a pile of... of...
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: (The sobbing begins.)
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: What's the situation? Have you figured it out?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Sir. We sent a man on recon... and he just suddenly stopped responding...
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: You useless sacks!!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: S—Sir, how about you send someone else to the first floor? We... We really can't spare a single man...
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: No response means you keep sending people down, or I stop on the second floor to shoot you all dead before heading down there myself!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Nobody move! Out!
attributes.name: Spooked Soldier

attributes.content: Phew... empty...
attributes.name: Spooked Soldier

attributes.content: Every scout we've sent has gone missing, one by one—maybe the first floor's h... haunted...?
attributes.name: Spooked Soldier

attributes.content: What an imagination you have. Get a little sleep for now.
Who th—
attributes.name: Spooked Soldier

attributes.content: Hey? Ramon? Ramon—you—you gotta say something...
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Dropped again... That's... the fourth one...
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Four times, four men... every time, as soon as they get downstairs, they just...
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: No one picks up on that sentence.
The terminals have all been tossed into one corner of the room. On occasion, the indistinct bellows of El Capitán emanate from the pile, but nobody is giving them a response anymore.
Maybe it's because they went one at a time, so we were just feeding them one by one to—
attributes.name: Worn-Out Soldier

attributes.content: So how many do you want to doom each time?!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: That Sankta madwoman, her mind's not right, she's a homicidal maniac, she, she... she's outside the door! She's smiling at us through the access surveillance cam!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Mayo, just hang the intercom up. She can't get in—
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: She's pointing her gun at me! She... She's pulling the trigger!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: All she can do is wreck the cam! Just calm down!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: (A gunshot rings out.)
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: W—What the... Mayo... Dead? Is that a bullet hole?!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: EYAAAAAAAAAAGGGH!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: How... about... we... watch a different tape.
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: The two stare at each other with slackened gazes for a moment, before the worn-out soldier gets up, travels to another corner of the room, and grabs a random tape to shove into the recorder.
...the 'Art Investor' here from Kazimierz, let's welcome our guest today, Mr. Reynell Kowalski, the new star of Dossoles's art scene!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: What did you put on this for? Are you sick?!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: I didn't know they taped the TV on this one!
attributes.name: Worn-Out Soldier

attributes.content: Switch it out, switch it out!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Hello, hello~ Pleased to meet you, new faces! And it's been a whole day, old faces! It's me, your host for this program, Eure—
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: I don't do this, but I'm begging you, switch it again. Listening to this presenter makes my brain hurt.
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: ...These three tapes are all we've got.
attributes.name: Worn-Out Soldier

attributes.content: The security guy just watches these three tapes on repeat?! What do you find if you open up his brain, soup?!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Today's episode is a special for all you tourists here in Dossoles for the first time...
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: The worn-out soldier firmly punches the eject button.
Let's just finish watching the movie.
attributes.name: Worn-Out Soldier

attributes.content: You heathenly... devils... Your day of reckoning... is come...
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: I—I—I'm warning you, my grandpa's a big deal in Kazdel! You wouldn't wanna see his witchcraft, even in death!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Heheh, HAHAHAhahaha...
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Don't you laugh so crooked—
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Hahaha... witchcraft... hahahaha...
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.text: When the firmament is filled by sunlight... when all dark across the land is disappeared without a trace...
She that is the twin moons will fall upon your cagebeast cell... the dark will gush forth into your eyes... and there you will meet...

attributes.content: Inhabiting Gemini.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Shuffling emits from the center of the room.
A single soldier, biting his lip, shivering head to toe, hands clenched tight, turns his gaze away from the screen... and with a shudder, over his shoulder.
He sees, inside the room, out of nowhere... a bizarre woman.
He sees that woman's complexion and her hair, both just as pale.

He sees that woman point at him with a tremendous firearm the likes of which he's never seen before. No surveillance cam needed now. Those etched bullets can pierce straight through his heart in an instant.
He sees that woman standing there, and yet it is as though she's somewhere else entirely, as though she doesn't even draw breath.
He sees that woman whose head is crowned...
By a halo.
Don't look back, don't look back... because I am right... behind you...!!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: The soldier that has looked back lets out a breathless wail, leading the others to nervously follow where his gaze has gone—
TH—THERE'S NO SUCH THINGS AS GHOSTS!!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: The soldier's senses tell him his shot landed, but the bolt meets no obstruction as it continues its trajectory, passing straight through the woman's body.
Just like that, she vanishes, and only the afterimage of the halo above her head still—
EYAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRGGGH!
attributes.name: Petrified Soldiers

attributes.content: Sir, report, it's a Sankta!!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: The enemy's a Sankta with spatial movement Arts, she's a homicidal maniac, her mind's not right, she can shoot people dead through surveillance cam—
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Slacking Soldier

attributes.content: Clear.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Clear.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I didn't think just turning the lights out when the Gemini got hit would be enough to spread that much panic...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Meanwhile, on the TV in the corner of the room, the Sankta continues the silver-screen massacre.
Kill! Kill! Kill! I'll cut off your horns and hang them as chimes upon the Lateran itself!
attributes.name: Voice on TV

attributes.content: Thank you all so much!
attributes.name: Newbie Investor

attributes.content: If you're after anything in terms of art investments, please be sure to let me—
attributes.name: Newbie Investor

attributes.content: Stop wasting breath, beat those feet!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Right, right...
attributes.name: Newbie Investor

attributes.content: Hm? Who's that you're carrying?
attributes.name: Community Musician

attributes.content: He got beat up for resisting, and he's still concussed. Faster if I give him a ride.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Wow. Nice to see some tough stuff among these guys.
attributes.name: Community Musician

attributes.content: By the way, we're in Exhibition Hall 2 of the Galería right now. Did you get to see that manuscript you wanted?
attributes.name: Community Musician

attributes.content: Ugh. Completely forgot about that, evacuating all these people.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Manuscript?
attributes.name: Destitute Noble

attributes.content: A Minoan bard's. Pamphlet says it's the 'highlight of the collection' for Hall 2. Know where it is?
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: I caught sight of it just now. It's on the other end of the hall; I can take you over if you'd like—
attributes.name: Destitute Noble

attributes.content: Lead the way, then!
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Sir, you can put me down now!
attributes.name: Destitute Noble

attributes.content: You're concussed, aren't you?! Just point the way, it'll be faster!
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Evac of Hall hostages almost complete.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Things went smoothly thanks to your Gemini Replicator.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Shakes head) I didn't know we'd get a break that lucky—it was just meant to be bait, that's all. I was expecting they'd unload all their firepower on the replicate like the community people did.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: All I can say is it took up a good position, and those defenders chose a good movie to pass the time.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Defenders outside the gallery are all swept now. What do we do next? Head to the third floor and rescue Ernesto?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Wait up!
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: You're that, um—that, er... whatever, you can't go any further that way!
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Oh, Mr. Miłosz. Not with Reynell after all, then.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Situation's urgent. Tell us anything surplus after the fact. You need to leave the Galería ASAP.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You're not going to interrogate me for any useful information?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: We're out of time for that.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I want to make a deal. I'll give you some information, and I'm hoping that after you have this information...
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: We can rescue Reynell?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Mr. Miłosz, if Reynell hadn't set up the bombs, this terrorist attack may never have come to fruition in the first place.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Reynell couldn't wire the entire Galería with bombs on his own. He suggested the idea, that's all. I imagine you know who carried the deed out.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: I know the timing on the bombs, and how to most efficiently disarm them.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: And that's how you plan to coerce us?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: How could I? You aren't the type to suffer coercion.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: I'm just hoping my willingness to cooperate can pull together a lifeline for him.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Alright. Tell us what you know, then.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: They're time bombs, set to go off this morning at 10 AM. If you want to stop them, you need to take care of four nodes along the detonator line.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: One of the four is in the basement, one's in a darkroom on the third floor, one's on the balcony on the sixth floor, and one is in the ventilation shaft in Reynell's own office.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: ...Sounds almost true.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: The one in the basement is most complicated. I suggest one of you go there with me—
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Good. Tecno, take the others. Keep searching for any more places where hostages might be hiding.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Diaz, Catapult, you handle one each of the third and sixth floor nodes. Doc, Iana and I will keep heading for the top. We'll buy more time to disarm the penthouse node.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: The third-floor darkroom's relatively hard to find. It's right above this hall, effectively, but getting there's a nightmare. I need pen and paper to draw a quick map of the route—
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: No need, I'll take it.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ernesto!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Leave the darkroom to me and Arleta.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: The sixth floor node is in the stairwell. There's a wall that'll look suspicious, and be very easy to break down.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Leave that to me.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Phew, I'm finally here, and it's just you two left. So, how do you feel seeing the manuscript—
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: Uh, wait, why are you carrying him now?
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: Urk... As soon as he saw the manuscript, he cried so hard he couldn't even breathe, and eventually passed out from his tears. It was all I could do to bear him on my back instead.
attributes.name: Destitute Noble

attributes.content: He passed out?
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: Doc, Doc! We need you! Someone's fainted here!
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: He's fine, he just cried himself out. His emotions likely overwhelmed him upon seeing the manuscript of his dreams.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Let him rest for a while in fresh air and he'll be fine.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I—If you say so...
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: ...Miss Ela, that's every card up my sleeve. It's all yours now.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Noted.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What happens if we fail? What if we aren't able to rescue him?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: In that case... I'll stay behind and keep him company.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: I hope you can save the others before then, Miss Ela. I don't want any more people than necessary in here.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Right, I've pulled the metal casing off. Inside, there's a total of—
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: —Miłosz, you crackpot! There's twelve whole bomb wires here!
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: What? The one in the basement has over forty connections?!
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Whatever, I'll settle this later.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Right now, I just need to dewire one by one, right?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Yeah. Yeah. Got it. Unscrew as fast as possible, half-connected states can send the explosives runaway easy. Understood.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Ela, how's things on your side?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Small band of resistance on the fourth floor still? Wow.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Diaz stops talking, wipes the sweat off his forehead, and focuses on dealing with the chaotic nest of wires at hand.
He has to decouple fast, and unscrew the connectors right after, using an insulator to cover up the naked wires and avoid any short-circuits.
In a trance, his days with the Singas army float through his mind, where his job was always to secure the connectors in—
Diaz furrows his brows and smacks his lips, hands never stopping. What happened then has nothing to do with now. Now, he's no more than a firefighter in the middle of bomb disposal.
The wires are more or less decoupled by now. Just two left, and all risk of explosion in this area is gone.
He's gotten a handle of how to most quickly twist these connectors off. Push down for the first half, spin slowly, then start turning with all his might for the second half until it's off.
He counts down the rotations on the second connector. Now just seven, six, five...
Seize that old man!
attributes.name: Irate Soldier

attributes.content: Two of El Capitán's men charge for the old firefighter with sabers in hand, while three crossbows are poised on the floor above.
The old firefighter's hands freeze upon the connector, and for a spell, he's somehow not sure if he's meant to twist one way or the other.
